text.autoconfig.drinkandstretch.title: Grog 'n Stretch Riggin'
text.autoconfig.drinkandstretch.option.d: Grog Reminder Interval (minutes o' the hour)
text.autoconfig.drinkandstretch.option.s: Stretch Reminder Interval (minutes o' the hour)
drinkandstretch.toast.drink.1.title: Drink ye grog
drinkandstretch.toast.drink.2.title: Hydration check, matey
drinkandstretch.toast.drink.2.message: Yer innards will be thankin' ye
drinkandstretch.toast.drink.3.title: Gulp down some sea water
drinkandstretch.toast.drink.4.title: Hydrate yerself
drinkandstretch.toast.drink.4.message: Yer noggin needs water too, arr
drinkandstretch.toast.drink.5.title: Water break
drinkandstretch.toast.drink.6.title: Drink water now
drinkandstretch.toast.drink.6.message: In real life, not in th' game
drinkandstretch.toast.drink.7.title: Clear potion o' life
drinkandstretch.toast.drink.8.title: Clear fluids time
drinkandstretch.toast.drink.8.message: Human bodies be mostly water, arr!
drinkandstretch.toast.drink.9.title: Th' water be not a lie
drinkandstretch.toast.drink.9.message: At least, I don't be thinkin' it is
drinkandstretch.toast.drink.10.title: Water fun fact
drinkandstretch.toast.drink.10.message: Space sailors be recyclin' their water
drinkandstretch.toast.drink.11.title: Why did th' water cross th' deck?
drinkandstretch.toast.drink_insult.1.mes: I've seen cacti more hydrated than ye
drinkandstretch.toast.drink_insult.2.mes: Yer brain be 73% water, not bilge
drinkandstretch.toast.drink_insult.3.mes: Even th' Nether scallywags be concerned
drinkandstretch.toast.drink_insult.4.mes: Or keep yer raisin cosplay, yer choice
drinkandstretch.toast.drink_insult.5.mes: Because it should be an ocean, arr
drinkandstretch.toast.drink_insult.7.mes: They be wantin' their water back
drinkandstretch.toast.drink_insult.10.me: Unlike th' brain cells ye be losin'
drinkandstretch.toast.drink_insult.11.ti: Fun fact: dehydration makes ye dumber
drinkandstretch.toast.stretch.1.title: Stretch, ye sea dog
drinkandstretch.toast.stretch.2.title: Stretch time
drinkandstretch.toast.stretch.3.title: Get up 'n move, matey!
drinkandstretch.toast.stretch.3.message: It be healthy in small doses
drinkandstretch.toast.stretch.4.title: Stretch break
drinkandstretch.toast.stretch.5.title: Time t' stretch
drinkandstretch.toast.stretch.6.title: Stand up in real life
drinkandstretch.toast.stretch.7.title: Loosen them joints
drinkandstretch.toast.stretch.8.title: Uncrouch yerself
drinkandstretch.toast.stretch.8.message: Ye don't be needin' t' sneak... Do ye?
drinkandstretch.toast.stretch.9.title: Walk around th' deck!
drinkandstretch.toast.stretch.9.message: Maybe go get more water, arr
drinkandstretch.toast.stretch.10.title: Stretch fun fact
drinkandstretch.toast.stretch.11.title: Stretch warnin'
drinkandstretch.toast.stretch_insult.1.m: Or has Davy Jones claimed ye?
drinkandstretch.toast.stretch_insult.2.m: Seagulls be about t' roost on ye
drinkandstretch.toast.stretch_insult.3.m: They be supposed t' bend, not fossilize
drinkandstretch.toast.stretch_insult.6.m: Because ye haven't moved in hours
drinkandstretch.toast.stretch_insult.8.m: And it be about t' file a complaint
Or join th' decorative block list
Let yer chair breathe, ye bilge rat!
Somethin' be goin' t' run: ye,
